title: Integrated Biostatistics and Bioinformatics Journal Club
description:
This module covers the following:  
- Uses published articles to highlight quantitative and medical science issues that are common to biostatistics and bioinformatics 
- Appreciates and critiques the use and misuse of quantitative methods in medical research 
- Identifies and reviews techniques and resources that biostatisticians and bioinformaticians need 
- Identifies potential areas for futher research
